text: Adolfo Navajas Artaza (26 May 1925 â€“ 2 August 2022) was an Argentine businessman and politician. He was an independent. He was Governor of Corrientes Province from 1969 to 1973. He also was Minister of Social Action from 1982 to 1983. He was born in Gobernador Virasoro, Argentina. Navajas died on 2 August 2022 at the age of 97. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Argentine politicians Category:Argentine businesspeople Category:Corrientes Province
title: Adolfo Navajas Artaza
